name: Bastardo
description:
Embody a western Mexican criminal on his way to the town's bank, blast through their defenses and take their money.

Controls:

Keyboard and Mouse:

W / A / S / D - Movement.

Arrows / Mouse - Look.

Space - Shoot.

Q - Change Weapons.

E - Throw Dynamite.

Gamepad:

Left Analog - Movement.

Right Analog - Look.

Right Trigger - Shoot.

Left Trigger - Change Weapons.

Left Button - Throw Dynamite.

Made in one week for the Shacknews Spring 2023 Game Jam. A lot of content didn't make the cut for time reasons and we'll be updating it soon, stay tuned.
